read_netlist Module¶

Created on Wed Oct 10 13:04:45 2018

@author: kunal

class read_netlist.SpiceParser(netlistPath, top_ckt_name=None, flat=1)[source]¶

Bases: object

Read a spice file (.sp/.cdl) and converts it to a graph. Device properties are inherited from BasicElement.py You can flatten the circuit by using flag: flat The final graph is stored in a yaml file in circuit_graphs folder.
